snippet.title: # BLUD
snippet.description:
Struggling to balance school and friends is hard enough as a young teen, but Becky Belmont must also deal with the balance between Good and Evil. After being trained by a mystical hunter, Becky is entrusted with the abilities to stop the vampire apocalypse. 

Animation: Chris Burns
Backgrounds, Compositing, Music & Sound: Bob Fox
Voice: Julie Shields

www.exit73studios.com
